tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: One Direction - Live While We're Young ( Lyrics + Full Song )
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: For More Information Of One Direction VISIT US ON : Facebook : www.facebook.com Twitter : twitter.com ———————————————————————————— '-Harry Channel : www.youtube.com '-Niall Channel : www.youtube.com '-Zayn Channel : www.youtube.com '-Louis Channel : www.youtube.com '-Liam Channel : www.youtube.com ————————————————————————————

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: My God whom I adore!﻿ *O*

OMG,﻿ Please ﻿ support Nialls Irish Cousin "Sarah Toner"﻿ Awesome﻿﻿ singer , Amazing cover,Sensational comments, only 14. Take time﻿ to﻿﻿ listen you will﻿﻿ be very pleased, This is﻿ one talented family﻿ (1D 4﻿ Ever)﻿ PLEASE PLEASE Support Sarah.The very﻿ best way to help﻿ is﻿ Tell all﻿ your friend & comment about Sarahs talent on Youtube, Facebook, Twitter & any social network.
Don't﻿ care if it isn't One Direction, it's claaaaass!
Ce ne sont pas les 1D --' On voit bien que ce n'est pas﻿ leurs voix --'
errr..this is not on direction, and shouldnt it say in the song 'live while we're young'? and as if they﻿ would do a song bout drugs.
this is not one direction as the bloody song isnt even on itunes yet so this cant be them﻿
lol this song is really catchy!﻿ :P
this﻿ is not one﻿ direction... but is cute
AWESOME! ﻿
Not One Direction. This song is messed up!﻿
ITS NOT EVEN 1D!! You are soo﻿ dumb! It says something about them taking drugs!! And Did you look at the name?? It says OneDirectlionVEVO!
deffs not them, a song about drugs is definitely conflicts with the kid﻿ friendly good boy 1d image. good trolling though.
This isn't 1D, lol﻿ u idiots! Its Chill Murray by Young Science! The name is onedirectLionvevo! :D So stop saying 1D sing this song amazingly! Lol
What happened to their beautiful﻿ and natural fucking voice ? ... It becamed a low autotuned ? ...

this cant be live while were young.... this is not one direction! what happend﻿ to the own sweet voices?? as much as i adore one direction im dissapointed by this song!! and the people in the studio dont remix there voices there perfect on there own!xxx love you 1D!!
obviously not 1d. but﻿ i still love the song :)
It's "Young Science" - Chill﻿ Murray... -,-
This is not by them. If you look at the other videos on this account you﻿ can see it is1 the offcial account. Not cool
errrr﻿ this is not one direction
so when is﻿ the real one coming out?september 1st?
This can't be the song either 1D.. THIS SONG﻿ IS ABOUT DRUGS DUDE
